Catalano.MachineLearning

Class BoltzmannExploration

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.MachineLearning.BoltzmannExploration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExplorationPolicy

    public class BoltzmannExploration
extends java.lang.Object
implements IExplorationPolicy
    The class implements exploration policy base on Boltzmann distribution. Acording to the policy, action a at state s is selected with the next probability: exp( Q( s, a ) / t ) p( s, a ) = ----------------------------- SUM( exp( Q( s, b ) / t ) ) b where Q(s, a) is action's a estimation (usefulness) at state s and t is Temperature.

      BoltzmannExploration(double temperature)
      Initializes a new instance of the BoltzmannExploration class.

      Methods

      The method chooses an action depending on the provided estimates.
      double getTemperature()
      If temperature is low, then the policy tends to be more greedy.
      void setTemperature(double temperature)
      The property sets the balance between exploration and greedy actions.

      • getTemperature

        public double getTemperature()

        Returns:

      • ChooseAction

        public int ChooseAction(double[] actionEstimates)
        The method chooses an action depending on the provided estimates. The estimates can be any sort of estimate, which values usefulness of the action (expected summary reward, discounted reward, etc).
        Specified by:
        ChooseAction in interface IExplorationPolicy
        Parameters:
        actionEstimates - Action Estimates.
        Returns:
        Return selected action.
